docs.lead_paragraph: A clinical social worker suggests that avoiding drugs and teenage pregnancy is crucial among the disadvantaged.
docs.snippet: A clinical social worker suggests that avoiding drugs and teenage pregnancy is crucial among the disadvantaged.

docs.lead_paragraph: Planned Parenthood called on the FBI and the U.S. Department of Justice on Monday for help managing cybersecurity, following a report that the reproductive healthcare group's website had been hacked by anti-abortion activists.

headline.main: Planned Parenthood Investigating Claims of Website Hack
headline.print_headline: Planned Parenthood Investigating Claims of Website Hack

docs.snippet: Planned Parenthood called on the FBI and the U.S. Department of Justice on Monday for help managing cybersecurity, following a report that the reproductive healthcare group's website had been hacked by anti-abortion activists.

headline.main: Today in Politics: Drowned Out by Donald Trump, Other Candidates Clamor for Space Onstage

docs.abstract: Less than two weeks before the first Republican presidential debate, candidates are turning up the volume in hopes of getting onstage and keeping up with Donald J. Trump.
docs.snippet: Less than two weeks before the first Republican presidential debate, candidates are turning up the volume in hopes of getting onstage and keeping up with Donald J. Trump.

docs.lead_paragraph: Republican politicians have refined the way they are talking about pregnancy and abortion rights, crafting their words in a way they hope puts Democrats on the defensive.

headline.main: Republicans Alter Script on Abortion, Seeking to Shift Debate
headline.print_headline: G.O.P. Rethinks the Way It Talks About Abortion

docs.abstract: Republican presidential candidates and other conservative politicians are undertaking sustained, sophisticated and coordinated effort to force debate on abortion; are abandoning rhetoric that many perceived as a 'war on women,' instead emphasizing emotionally resonant ideas like joy of pregnancy and first ultrasound; strategy has so far targeted Planned Parenthood, women's health organization that receives significant funding from federal government.
docs.snippet: Republican politicians have refined the way they are talking about pregnancy and abortion rights, crafting their words in a way they hope puts Democrats on the defensive.

docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. Republican presidential contender Rand Paul said on Sunday he plans to push Congress to cut federal funding for the non-profit reproductive healthcare organization Planned Parenthood in a debate over its treatment of aborted fetal tissue.

headline.main: Rand Paul Plans to Keep Pushing to Defund U.S. Planned Parenthood
headline.print_headline: Rand Paul Plans to Keep Pushing to Defund U.S. Planned Parenthood

docs.snippet: U.S. Republican presidential contender Rand Paul said on Sunday he plans to push Congress to cut federal funding for the non-profit reproductive healthcare organization Planned Parenthood in a debate over its treatment of aborted fetal tissue.

docs.lead_paragraph: Female writers don’t need to destroy the world in order to imagine feeling unsafe in it.

headline.main: It’s the End of the World as She Knows It
headline.print_headline: It’s the End of the World as She Knows It

docs.abstract: Sloane Crosley observes that female authors easily create multilayered stories by presenting physical danger without making it the main event.
docs.snippet: Female writers don’t need to destroy the world in order to imagine feeling unsafe in it.

docs.lead_paragraph: In this memoir, a birth mother rues her choice.
docs.abstract: Jennifer Gilmore reviews book God and Jetfire: Confessions of a Birth Mother by Amy C Seek.

docs.lead_paragraph: When Sandra Bland died in a small Texas jail last week, she became just the latest name on a long list of inmates whose deaths were determined to be suicides.

docs.lead_paragraph: Tens of thousands of new mothers in Britain are forced out of their jobs each year, a survey published on Friday said.
